column5: Taegeuk is the Korean term cognate with the Chinese term Taiji (T'ai-chi in Wade-Giles spelling), and means 'supreme ultimate' or 'great polarity/duality'

column1: Korea consists of the Korean Peninsula, [1] Island, and several minor islands near the peninsula.
